content: DSH 600-X 12 Gas cut-off saw Compact top-handle gas saw (63cc) with blade brake, for cutting up to 4-3/4 with 12 blades in concrete, masonry, and metal ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Concrete saws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Top-handle design for even more compactness and lighter weight Fast blade stop – the blade stops in less than 10 seconds Cutting depth up to 4-3/4 with 12 blades Aluminum belt cover Achieve even higher cutting speeds by using with customized Hilti blades Applications Laying paving – cutting curbstones and paving slabs to size Masonry work – cutting bricks and blocks to size Metalwork – cutting steel profiles, pipes and steel sheets Construction work – cutting out openings in brick or concrete walls ### TECHNICAL DATA: Motor cylinder: 63.3 cm³ Rated power: 3.2 kW Wet or dry operation: Wet and Dry Technical Data | Motor cylinder | 63.3 cm³ | Rated power | 3.2 kW | Wet or dry operation | Wet and Dry | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 22 x 12.8 x 14.6 mm | Fuel mixture | 50:1 (2% oil) | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 102 dB (A) | 1 | Disc diameter | 12 in | Cutting depth | 5 in | Triaxial vibration value for cutting concrete slab (ah) | 2.5 m/s² | 2 | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3563750 - DSH 600X + 1 DSH-P Water Pump + 1 SPX Diamond Blade - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DSH 600-X Hand-held gas saw - 1x Cutting disc 12x1 SPX univ - 1x Pump - 3563747 - DSH 600X + 3 P Diamond Blades - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DSH 600-X Hand-held gas saw - 3x Cutting disc 12x1 P univ - 3563746 - DSH 600X + 2 SP Diamond Blades - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DSH 600-X Hand-held gas saw - 2x Cutting disc 12x1 SP univ - 3563745 - DSH 600X + 1 SPX Diamond Blade - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DSH 600-X Hand-held gas saw - 1x Cutting disc 12x1 SPX univ - 3602055 - DSH 600-X + (10) 12 UP Abrasive Discs - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DSH 600-X Hand-held gas saw - 10x Cutting disc 12x5/32x20 ST SPX - 2313441 - Hand-held gas saw DSH 600-X - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DSH 600-X Hand-held gas saw
